about_the_game:
Godly Visage is a Metroidvania with a Souls-Like style in its gameplay and a design close to the Victorian.

In the adventure you will play as Godly, the youngest of three brothers, traveling through a devastated world, crossing huge castles and cities, getting lost in the nooks and crannies of the world, exploring and finding valuable items to sell.
Upgrade your character for the challenge that awaits you at every corner, meet new characters that will help you and accompany you along the way.

Discover the mysteries hidden in the great gates and in the immense scenarios, challenge legendary enemies corrupted by a divine disease that you must overthrow.

Game features:

2D side-scrolling video game.
Adjusted controls for both keyboard and mouse and controller.
Find various skills in pure Metroidvania style.
Traditional animation and design done frame by frame.
Discover colorful and interesting characters you meet along the way.
Challenge enemies and fearsome bosses.
Collect lost annotations to unravel more of this mysterious world.
